str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To terrify, scare, strike with panic. Probably akin to the alternate of pipto or to petomai; to scare.
Full of fear, terrified. From en and phobos; in fear, i.e. Alarmed.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb, doko dok'-o of the same meaning; to think; by implication, to seem.
From a derivative of theaomai; to be a spectator of, i.e. Discern, (experience) or intensively (acknowledge).
